name: Side-Tracked
description:
Side-Tracked is a two-player local multiplayer game developed as a student project at NHTV, running on a custom engine. Two players must defend a train which is navigating a looping track around a level while being attacked by monsters shooting at it and running alongside it. The enemies will randomly drop one of 3 pickups which upgrade the players weapon and make it more effective at eliminating the enemies. Try to defeat all the monsters and keep the train alive until the end of the level to win!

PC Installation Instructions

  1. Download the .zip file
  2. Extract the contents into desired destination
  3. Launch the game by double-clicking the “Core.exe” file

 

Known Issues

  • -Restart menu currently isn’t functional
  • -Shooting the turret without aiming can damage the train and result in a “Game Over” screen
  • -The load times can last upwards of 1 minute
  • -Some flying enemies have a tendency to get stuck behind the train
  • -Certain enemy animations aren’t properly implemented
